Package <Unnamed>

Class Summary
Gis Gis Class: This class is in charge of show and update the map with its layers.
Layer Layer Class: generates a layer specifying its feature and its style
MapView MapView Class: In this class we set the MapFrame with all its features.
PopUp PopUp class: Makes a popup from a SimpleFeature passed by parameter
SigmaApp SigmaApp class: The main class of the application sigma.
SigmaView SigmaView Class: The application's graphic interface.
StyleMaker StyleMaker class: Creates two differents styles
